dataset_name: Brazil - Primary Enrollment and GDP per capita (2001-2020)
source_files: API_SE.PRM.ENRL_DS2_en_csv_v2_4538564.zip (UN data source for primary enrollment)
WDI_csv.zip (World Bank WDI GDP per capita, messy source cleaned)
notes: Primary enrollment is for Brazil for years 2001-2020. GDP per capita is in current US dollars. Rows correspond to years; file contains header row.

columns.name: RowIndex
columns.meaning: Row number / index (0-based or 1-based depending on export); used for display ordering only

columns.name: Primary_Enrollment
columns.meaning: Primary school enrollment for Brazil in the given year. (Format used in this CSV: percentage of relevant population; if absolute number, it will be noted below.)

columns.name: GDP_per_capita
columns.meaning: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) per capita for Brazil in the given year, expressed in current US dollars.

columns.name: Country
columns.meaning: Country name. This dataset contains only Brazil (included for clarity).

data_quality.missing_values: Years with no data are represented as null or blank in the CSV. No rows were removed except where both enrollment and GDP were missing.
transformations: GDP data parsed and cleaned from messy WDI CSV; non-numeric characters removed, thousand separators normalized, and values cast to float.
Enrollment values extracted from UN CSV and matched to years 2001-2020.
Joined on Year and Country; country codes validated for Brazil (BRA).
data_quality.contact: Your Name (replace with your name or course ID)
